APS Translation Debugger

Debug file translation issues and analyze Model Derivative conversion problems

Translation Job Info

üõ†Ô∏è Debug Without Token

This tool can analyze URN format and provide debugging guidance even without an access token.

Debug Results

Enter a URN or Object ID to start debugging

üö® Common Translation Issues

File Format Issues

  • ‚Ä¢ Unsupported format: Check APS supported formats list
  • ‚Ä¢ Corrupted file: Try opening locally first
  • ‚Ä¢ Password protected: Remove password before upload
  • ‚Ä¢ File too large: Check size limits (5GB for most formats)

API Issues

  • ‚Ä¢ Invalid URN: Ensure proper Base64 encoding
  • ‚Ä¢ Missing scopes: Require viewables:read + code:all
  • ‚Ä¢ Token expired: Refresh authentication
  • ‚Ä¢ Rate limiting: Implement retry with backoff

üìã Translation Status Codes

Success States

  • inprogress - Translation running
  • success - Completed successfully
  • complete - All derivatives ready

Error States

  • failed - Translation failed
  • timeout - Operation timed out
  • partial - Some derivatives failed

ü§ñ Debug with RAPS CLI

RAPS provides comprehensive debugging tools:

# Check translation status
raps translate status YOUR_URN
# Get detailed manifest
raps translate manifest YOUR_URN --verbose
# Debug with retry and logging
raps translate YOUR_URN --debug --retry 3
